testCases.name: User Registration Flow
testCases.description: Verify new user can successfully register an account
preconditions: Navigate to application
Should be redirected to /auth page
steps: Click 'Don't have an account? Sign up' link
testCases.expectedOutcome: User is registered and automatically logged in, redirected to dashboard with welcome message
testCases.failureCondition: Registration fails, error message displayed, or not redirected to dashboard

testCases.name: User Login with Existing Credentials
testCases.description: Verify existing user can log in with correct credentials
preconditions: Navigate to /auth page
testCases.expectedOutcome: User successfully logs in and is redirected to dashboard showing 'Welcome Alice Smith'
testCases.failureCondition: Login fails or user not redirected to dashboard

testCases.name: Login with Invalid Credentials
testCases.description: Verify appropriate error message for incorrect password
preconditions: Navigate to /auth page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Error message displayed: 'Invalid email or password'
testCases.failureCondition: User is logged in or no error message shown

testCases.name: Protected Route Access Without Authentication
testCases.description: Verify unauthenticated users cannot access protected routes
preconditions: User is logged out
testCases.expectedOutcome: User is automatically redirected to /auth login page
testCases.failureCondition: User can access dashboard without authentication

testCases.name: Authentication Persistence After Page Reload
testCases.description: Verify user remains logged in after page refresh
preconditions: User is logged in
steps: Refresh the page (F5 or browser reload)
testCases.expectedOutcome: User remains authenticated and stays on dashboard without redirect to login
testCases.failureCondition: User is logged out or redirected to login page

testCases.name: Create New Task with Name Only
testCases.description: Verify user can create a task with just a name
preconditions: User is logged in and on dashboard
steps: Wait for task to be created
testCases.expectedOutcome: Task appears in task list with name 'Test Task 1' and 'No due date'
testCases.failureCondition: Task is not created or not visible in list

testCases.name: Create Task with Name and Due Date
testCases.description: Verify user can create a task with name and due date
preconditions: User is logged in and on dashboard
steps: Enter task name: 'Test Task with Date'
Wait for task to be created
testCases.expectedOutcome: Task appears in list with correct name and due date formatted
testCases.failureCondition: Task not created or due date not displayed correctly

testCases.name: Mark Task as Complete
testCases.description: Verify user can mark an incomplete task as complete
preconditions: User is logged in with at least one incomplete task
steps: Find an incomplete task in the list
Click 'Mark Complete' button on the task
testCases.expectedOutcome: Task shows 'âœ“ Completed' status, text is struck through, background becomes gray
testCases.failureCondition: Task status does not update or visual changes don't apply

testCases.name: Delete Task with Confirmation
testCases.description: Verify user can delete a task after confirmation
preconditions: User is logged in with at least one task
steps: Find a task in the list
testCases.expectedOutcome: Task is removed from the list
testCases.failureCondition: Task remains in list or no confirmation dialog shown

testCases.name: Cancel Task Deletion
testCases.description: Verify user can cancel task deletion
preconditions: User is logged in with at least one task
steps: Find a task in the list
testCases.expectedOutcome: Task remains in the list, dialog closes
testCases.failureCondition: Task is deleted despite cancellation

testCases.name: Search Tasks by Name
testCases.description: Verify search functionality filters tasks by name
preconditions: User is logged in with multiple tasks
steps: Enter search term in 'Search tasks' field (e.g., 'project')
testCases.expectedOutcome: Only tasks containing the search term in their name are displayed
testCases.failureCondition: All tasks still shown or search doesn't filter correctly

testCases.name: Filter Tasks by Completion Status - Incomplete
testCases.description: Verify incomplete filter shows only incomplete tasks
preconditions: User is logged in with both complete and incomplete tasks
testCases.expectedOutcome: Only incomplete tasks are displayed
testCases.failureCondition: Complete tasks are still visible

testCases.name: Filter Tasks by Completion Status - Complete
testCases.description: Verify complete filter shows only completed tasks
preconditions: User is logged in with at least one complete task
testCases.expectedOutcome: Only completed tasks are displayed with checkmarks
testCases.failureCondition: Incomplete tasks are shown or no tasks displayed

testCases.name: Combined Search and Filter
testCases.description: Verify search and filter work together
preconditions: User is logged in with multiple tasks
testCases.expectedOutcome: Only incomplete tasks containing 'task' in name are shown
testCases.failureCondition: Filters don't work together or wrong tasks displayed

testCases.name: Clear Search Query
testCases.description: Verify clearing search shows all tasks again
preconditions: User has active search filter applied
testCases.expectedOutcome: All tasks (respecting status filter) are displayed again
testCases.failureCondition: Tasks remain filtered or don't reload

testCases.name: Navigation Bar Visibility
testCases.description: Verify top navigation bar is present and functional
preconditions: User is on any page
steps: Observe top of page for navigation bar
Check for user information or menu items
testCases.expectedOutcome: Navigation bar is visible with appropriate content
testCases.failureCondition: No navigation bar or missing key elements

testCases.name: Footer Visibility
testCases.description: Verify footer is present at bottom of page
preconditions: User is on any page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Footer is visible with appropriate content
testCases.failureCondition: No footer present

testCases.name: Welcome Message Personalization
testCases.description: Verify dashboard shows personalized welcome message
preconditions: User is logged in as 'Alice Smith'
steps: Look for welcome message at top
testCases.expectedOutcome: Message displays 'Welcome Alice Smith' or similar with user's name
testCases.failureCondition: Generic message or wrong name displayed

testCases.name: Loading States During Task Operations
testCases.description: Verify loading indicators appear during async operations
preconditions: User is logged in
steps: Click 'Add Task' button after entering task name
testCases.expectedOutcome: Buttons show loading state (e.g., 'Adding...', disabled state) during operations
testCases.failureCondition: No loading indication, buttons remain clickable during operation

testCases.name: Empty Task List State
testCases.description: Verify appropriate message when no tasks exist
preconditions: User is logged in with no tasks
steps: Delete all tasks or use new account
testCases.expectedOutcome: Appropriate message or empty state shown (or empty list)
testCases.failureCondition: Error displayed or unclear state

testCases.name: Task Visual States
testCases.description: Verify tasks display correct visual states
preconditions: User has both complete and incomplete tasks
testCases.expectedOutcome: Complete tasks: gray background, opacity reduced, text struck through. Incomplete: white background, normal opacity
testCases.failureCondition: No visual distinction between task states

testCases.name: Navigate to Task Details
testCases.description: Verify user can navigate to task details page
preconditions: User is logged in with at least one task
steps: Find a task in the list
testCases.expectedOutcome: User is navigated to /task/:task_id route showing task details
testCases.failureCondition: Navigation fails or 404 error shown

testCases.name: Return to Dashboard from Task Details
testCases.description: Verify user can return to dashboard from task details
preconditions: User is on task details page
steps: Look for back button or home link
testCases.expectedOutcome: User returns to main dashboard with task list
testCases.failureCondition: Cannot return to dashboard or navigation broken

testCases.name: Empty Task Name Validation
testCases.description: Verify user cannot create task with empty name
preconditions: User is logged in
testCases.expectedOutcome: Button is disabled or shows validation error
testCases.failureCondition: Empty task is created

testCases.name: Email Format Validation on Registration
testCases.description: Verify invalid email format is rejected
preconditions: Navigate to registration page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Validation error shown for invalid email format
testCases.failureCondition: Account created with invalid email or no validation

testCases.name: Duplicate Email Registration
testCases.description: Verify cannot register with existing email
preconditions: Navigate to registration page
user1@example.com exists
testCases.expectedOutcome: Error message: 'User with this email already exists'
testCases.failureCondition: Second account created or no error shown

testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
preconditions: Navigate to application
steps: Check for authentication page or dashboard
Verify multiple interactive elements exist (forms, buttons, inputs)
Verify application has real features: task management, authentication
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application shows full task management system with authentication, task CRUD, search/filter capabilities
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or generic template, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Task List Load Performance
testCases.description: Verify task list loads in reasonable time
preconditions: User is logged in
steps: Measure time from navigation to tasks displayed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Tasks load within 2-3 seconds, loading indicator shown during fetch
testCases.failureCondition: Tasks take excessive time to load or page hangs

test_execution_notes: Run authentication tests first to establish logged-in state
Task management tests require authenticated user
Some tests depend on seed data being present
Use user1@example.com for most tests as it has multiple tasks
Search/filter tests work best with diverse task data
Create fresh test user for registration tests to avoid conflicts
Task isolation: each test should clean up created tasks or use separate accounts
known_limitations: No logout button visible in UI (state clears but no explicit UI action)
Search is case-insensitive but requires exact substring match
No pagination UI despite backend support
No task sorting UI (backend supports it)
No email verification for new accounts
Task details page component exists but functionality unclear
